title: Bad Childhood, Good Life Week: I’m Suffering From Mother’s Day Depression
description:
The last five years of Laura’s relationship with her mother were not happy ones to remember. Her mom indulged in alcohol and was physically and verbally abusive. - Dr. Laura: "Live in today; don’t whine about decades ago."

Has your mommy or daddy lost their parenting card? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Order Dr. Laura's book: “Bad Childhood, Good Life”

go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-bad-childhood-good-life

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
